question.title: Log "HTTP Status 404 – Not Found" differently from Spring dispatcher
question.body:
Having difficulty logging in the application logs when the request endpoint does not match what is set in "server.servlet.context-path." I am setting server.servlet.context-path=/endpoint in application.properties and when sending SOAP request to http://localhost:8800/ instead of http://localhost:8800/endpoint for example Spring dispatcher returns "HTTP Status 404 – Not Found" but that isn't logged in the app logs and it looks like the application didn't even get hit, which effectively it didn't.

Can I override this in the app config somehow? I'd like to log something different.
